concept.description: Labels all .ui packages as LAYER and UI.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:PACKAGE) WHERE p.FQN =~ "com\\.buschmais\\.jqassistant.*\\.ui" SET p:LAYER:UI RETURN p AS package

concept.description: Labels all .logic packages as LAYER and LOGIC.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:PACKAGE) WHERE p.FQN =~ "com\\.buschmais\\.jqassistant.*\\.logic" SET p:LAYER:LOGIC RETURN p AS package

concept.description: Labels all .persistence packages as LAYER and PERSISTENCE.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:PACKAGE) WHERE p.FQN =~ "com\\.buschmais\\.jqassistant.*\\.persistence" SET p:LAYER:PERSISTENCE RETURN p AS package

constraint.description: Packages in layer UI must have only dependencies to classes in layer UI, LOGIC or PERSISTENCE.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE:LAYER:UI)-[:CONTAINS*]->(typeFieldOrMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY|IMPLEMENTS|EXTENDS|THROWS|DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:TYPE), (dependencyPackage:PACKAGE:LAYER)-[:CONTAINS*]->(dependency) WHERE NOT ( dependencyPackage:UI OR dependencyPackage:LOGIC OR dependencyPackage:PERSISTENCE ) RETURN typeFieldOrMethod AS element, dependencyPackage AS dependency

constraint.description: Packages in layer Logic must have only dependencies to classes in layer LOGIC or PERSISTENCE.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE:LAYER:LOGIC)-[:CONTAINS*]->(typeFieldOrMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY|IMPLEMENTS|EXTENDS|THROWS|DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:TYPE), (dependencyPackage:PACKAGE:LAYER)-[:CONTAINS*]->(dependency) WHERE NOT ( dependencyPackage:LOGIC OR dependencyPackage:PERSISTENCE ) RETURN typeFieldOrMethod AS element, dependencyPackage AS dependency

constraint.description: Packages in layer Persistence must have only dependencies to classes in layer PERSISTENCE.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE:LAYER:PERSISTENCE)-[:CONTAINS*]->(typeFieldOrMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY|IMPLEMENTS|EXTENDS|THROWS|DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:TYPE), (dependencyPackage:PACKAGE:LAYER)-[:CONTAINS*]->(dependency) WHERE NOT ( dependencyPackage:PERSISTENCE ) RETURN typeFieldOrMethod AS element, dependencyPackage AS dependency
